verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- And the word שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El of Samuel לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; came to all Israel וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze went out יִשְׂרָאֵל֩ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El Now Israel לִקְרַ֨את <WH7122> lik-Rat to meet פְּלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim the Philistines לַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah, to battle וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- beside הָאֶ֣בֶן ha-'E-ven הָעֵ֔זֶר <WH72> ha-'E-zer, beside Ebenezer וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> u-fe-lish-Tim and the Philistines חָנ֥וּ <WH2583> cha-Nu pitched בַאֲפֵֽק׃ <WH663> va-'a-Fek. in Aphek

וַיַּעַרְכ֨וּ <WH6186> vai-ya-'ar-Chu put themselves in array פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim And the Philistines לִקְרַ֣את <WH7122> lik-Rat to meet יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Israel וַתִּטֹּשׁ֙ <WH5203> vat-tit-Tosh and when they joined הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> ham-mil-cha-Mah, battle וַיִּנָּ֥גֶף <WH5062> vai-yin-Na-gef was smitten יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El Israel לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim; the Philistines וַיַּכּ֤וּ <WH5221> vai-yak-Ku and they slew בַמַּֽעֲרָכָה֙ <WH4634> vam-ma-'a-ra-Chah of the army בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh, in the field כְּאַרְבַּ֥עַת <WH702> ke-'ar-Ba-'at about four אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> 'Ish. men

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo were come הָעָם֮ <WH5971> ha-'Am And when the people אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֒ <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh into the camp וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> zik-Nei the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Why נְגָפָ֧נוּ <WH5062> ne-ga-Fa-nu smitten יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Wherefore hath the LORD הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom us to day לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim; Philistine נִקְחָ֧ה <WH3947> nik-Chah accept אֵלֵ֣ינוּ <WH413> 'e-Lei-nu to מִשִּׁלֹ֗ה <WH7887> mish-shi-Loh, out of Shiloh אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> 'a-rOn the ark בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> be-Rit of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְיָבֹ֣א <WH935> ve-ya-Vo unto us that when it cometh בְקִרְבֵּ֔נוּ <WH7130> ve-kir-Be-nu, among וְיֹשִׁעֵ֖נוּ <WH3467> ve-yo-shi-'E-nu us it may save מִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> mik-Kaf us out of the hand אֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-nu. of our enemies

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am So the people שִׁלֹ֔ה <WH7887> shi-Loh, to Shiloh וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> vai-yis-'U that they might bring מִשָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> mish-Sham, there אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et אֲר֧וֹן <WH727> a-Ron from thence the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> be-rit- of the covenant יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yo-Shev which dwelleth הַכְּרֻבִ֑ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim; [between] the cherubims וְשָׁ֞ם <WH8033> ve-Sham there שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> she-Nei and the two בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- sons עֵלִ֗י <WH5941> 'e-Li, of Eli עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with אֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> 'a-rOn [were] there with the ark בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> be-Rit of the covenant הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God חָפְנִ֖י <WH2652> cha-fe-Ni Hophni וּפִֽינְחָֽס׃ <WH6372> u-Fi-ne-Chas. and Phinehas

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become כְּב֨וֹא <WH935> ke-Vo came אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> a-Ron And when the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> be-rit- of the covenant יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh, into the camp וַיָּרִ֥עוּ <WH7321> vai-ya-Ri-'u shouted כָל־ <WH3605> chol all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El all Israel תְּרוּעָ֣ה <WH8643> te-ru-'Ah shout גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah; with a great וַתֵּהֹ֖ם <WH1949> vat-te-Hom rang again הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. so that the earth

וַיִּשְׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> vai-yish-me-'U heard פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim And when the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the noise הַתְּרוּעָ֔ה <WH8643> hat-te-ru-'Ah, of the shout וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, they said מֶ֠ה <WH4100> meh What ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol What [meaneth] the noise הַתְּרוּעָ֧ה <WH8643> hat-te-ru-'Ah shout הַגְּדוֹלָ֛ה <WH1419> hag-ge-do-Lah of this great הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> haz-Zot in בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> be-ma-cha-Neh in the camp הָעִבְרִ֑ים <WH5680> ha-'iv-Rim; of the Hebrews וַיֵּ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> vai-Ye-de-'U, understood כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki that אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron that the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD בָּ֖א <WH935> ba was come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> Ham-ma-cha-Neh. into the camp

וַיִּֽרְאוּ֙ <WH3372> vai-yir-'U were afraid הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> hap-pe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אָמְר֔וּ <WH559> 'a-me-Ru, for they said בָּ֥א <WH935> ba is come אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh; into the camp וַיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said א֣וֹי <WH188> o Woe לָ֔נוּ La-nu, כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki For לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nothing הָיְתָ֛ה <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah has happened כָּזֹ֖את <WH2063> ka-Zot likewise אֶתְמ֥וֹל <WH865> et-Mol before time שִׁלְשֹֽׁם׃ <WH8032> shil-Shom. before that time

א֣וֹי <WH188> o Woe לָ֔נוּ La-nu, מִ֣י <WH4310> mi Who יַצִּילֵ֔נוּ <WH5337> yatz-tzi-Le-nu, unto us who shall deliver מִיַּ֛ד <WH3027> mi-Yad us out of the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him are the gods הָאַדִּירִ֖ים <WH117> ha-'ad-di-Rim of these mighty הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh; of these אֵ֧לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh of these הֵ֣ם <WH1992> hem like הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, are the gods הַמַּכִּ֧ים <WH5221> ham-mak-Kim that smote אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim the Egyptians בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all מַכָּ֖ה <WH4347> mak-Kah with all the plagues בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar. in the wilderness

הִֽתְחַזְּק֞וּ <WH2388> hit-chaz-ze-Ku Be strong וִֽהְי֤וּ <WH1961> vih-Yu and quit לַֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> la-'a-na-Shim and be men פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, O ye Philistines פֶּ֚ן <WH6435> pen or תַּעַבְד֣וּ <WH5647> ta-'av-Du that ye be not servants לָעִבְרִ֔ים <WH5680> la-'iv-Rim, unto the Hebrews כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after עָבְד֖וּ <WH5647> 'a-ve-Du as they have been לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; וִהְיִיתֶ֥ם <WH1961> vih-yi-Tem to you quit לַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> la-'a-na-Shim therefore be men וְנִלְחַמְתֶּֽם׃ <WH3898> ve-nil-cham-Tem. and fight

וַיִּלָּחֲמ֣וּ <WH3898> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu fought פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines וַיִּנָּ֤גֶף <WH5062> vai-yin-Na-gef was smitten יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El and Israel וַיָּנֻ֙סוּ֙ <WH5127> vai-ya-Nu-su and they fled אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man לְאֹהָלָ֔יו <WH168> le-'o-ha-Lav, into his tent וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> vat-te-Hi become הַמַּכָּ֖ה <WH4347> ham-mak-Kah slaughter גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah great מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; and there was a very וַיִּפֹּל֙ <WH5307> vai-yip-Pol for there fell מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> mi-Yis-ra-'El, of Israel שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim thirty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand רַגְלִֽי׃ <WH7273> rag-Li. footmen

וַאֲר֥וֹן <WH727> va-'a-Ron And the ark אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him of God נִלְקָ֑ח <WH3947> nil-Kach; was taken וּשְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> u-she-Nei and the two בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- sons עֵלִי֙ <WH5941> 'e-Li of Eli מֵ֔תוּ <WH4191> Me-tu, were slain חָפְנִ֖י <WH2652> cha-fe-Ni Hophni וּפִֽינְחָֽס׃ <WH6372> u-Fi-ne-Chas. and Phinehas

וַיָּ֤רָץ <WH7323> vai-Ya-rotz And there ran אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- a man בִּנְיָמִן֙ <WH1144> bin-ya-Min of Benjamin מֵהַמַּ֣עֲרָכָ֔ה <WH4634> me-ham-Ma-'a-ra-Chah, out of the army וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and came שִׁלֹ֖ה <WH7887> shi-Loh to Shiloh בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom the same day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu; the same וּמַדָּ֣יו <WH4055> u-mad-Dav with his clothes קְרֻעִ֔ים <WH7167> ke-ru-'Im, rent וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> va-'a-da-Mah and with earth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> ro-Sho. upon his head

וַיָּב֗וֹא <WH935> vai-ya-Vo, And when he came וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold עֵ֠לִי <WH5941> 'E-li lo Eli יֹשֵׁ֨ב <WH3427> yo-Shev sat עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַכִּסֵּ֜א <WH3678> hak-kis-Se upon a seat; יַךְ yach כיַ֥ד <WH5221> Yad beat קדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> de-rech the road מְצַפֶּ֔ה <WH6822> me-tzap-Peh, watching כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become לִבּוֹ֙ <WH3820> lib-Bo for his heart חָרֵ֔ד <WH2730> cha-Red, trembled עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al for אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron for the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God וְהָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> ve-ha-'Ish, And when the man בָּ֚א <WH935> ba came לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> le-hag-Gid and told בָּעִ֔יר <WH5892> ba-'Ir, into the city וַתִּזְעַ֖ק <WH2199> vat-tiz-'Ak cried out כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> ha-'Ir. [it] all the city

Eli

וְעֵלִ֕י <WH5941> ve-'e-Li Now Eli בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> tish-'Im was ninety וּשְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <WH8083> u-she-mo-Neh and eight שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וְעֵינָ֣יו <WH5869> ve-'ei-Nav and his eyes קָ֔מָה <WH6965> Ka-mah, were dim וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יָכ֖וֹל <WH3201> ya-Chol that he could לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <WH7200> lir-'ot. not see

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said הָאִ֜ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish And the man אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עֵלִ֗י <WH5941> 'e-Li, unto Eli אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I הַבָּ֣א <WH935> hab-Ba I [am] he that came מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַמַּעֲרָכָ֔ה <WH4634> ham-ma-'a-ra-Chah, out of the army וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הַמַּעֲרָכָ֖ה <WH4634> ham-ma-'a-ra-Chah out of the army נַ֣סְתִּי <WH5127> Nas-ti and I fled הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom; to day וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said מֶֽה־ <WH4100> meh- How הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah go הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> had-da-Var What is there done בְּנִֽי׃ <WH1121> be-Ni. afflicted
